author: scooperstein
body: This PR adds a set of new ParticleNet-based trainings with an extended scope from the jet flavor classifier trainings already included in this repository. The network for AK4 jets performs jet flavor classification, tau ID and reconstruction, and jet pT regression, while the network for AK8 jets performs both jet classification and resonance mass regression, including for the first time resonance decays to hadronic taus. More details are available in the included README files.
title: add ParticleNetFromMiniAOD models
